response:
"datenschutz ist menschenrecht! warum geben wir unsere persönlichen daten so leichtfertig an konzerne ab? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #menschenrechte" 

translation: 
"data protection is a human right! why do we give away our personal data so carelessly to corporations? #dataprotection #privacy #humanrights"

(note: the hashtags are commonly used in the german twitter community to raise awareness about data privacy and related issues.)
